 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּתַת‎</span>] **verb** ==break up, crumble== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Infinitive absolute*** of bread of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּתוֺת אֹתָהּ פִּתִּים ׃מִנְתָה‎</span> [[Lev.2.6|Lev 2:6]].
